doc.field:
One declaration made and signed by Philip Pope at the Custom House of Wilmington, Delaware. Using a pre-printed form, Pope declared the importation of wrought iron from Cardiff on the ship Mary Ann under Arthur Child as master.
To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: Philip Pope declaration of imports
